body.p: If during the reporting period an entity has, without having a contractual obligation to do so, provided financial or other support to an unconsolidated structured entity in which it previously had or currently has an interest (for example, purchasing assets of or instruments issued by the structured entity), the entity shall disclose:

li.p: the type and amount of support provided, including situations in which the entity assisted the structured entity in obtaining financial support; and
the reasons for providing the support.
